lead_paragraph: As one Atlantic City casino after another shut down and left thousands of workers jobless, Mayor Don Guardian insisted that the meltdown that claimed four of his city's 12 casinos since January was actually the opportunity of a lifetime for savvy investors.

headline.main: Deep Discount Lures Buyer for Revel Casino
headline.print_headline: Deep Discount Lures Buyer for Revel Casino
